short_summary: Notice of Proposed Procurement (NPP) for replacement parts for the Department of National Defence.
description: Request for Supply Arrangement for the Department of National Defence to acquire replacement parts for the Various Aircrafts of DND, DAP 4. The procurement is intended to be on a competitive basis, with the highest combined rating of technical merit and price as the selection criteria. The request is open to qualified suppliers invited by the contracting authority. The Government Electronic Tendering System is not responsible for the distribution of the RFP documents. Inquiries regarding this RFP should be submitted to June Cole.
full_summary:
================================

**Aviation Replacement Parts for Various Aircrafts**

**Reference Number:** cb-5565-46080029
**Solicitation Number:** W8485-247656/A

**Notice of Proposed Procurement (NPP)**

The Department of National Defence (DND) is seeking experienced suppliers to provide aviation replacement parts for various aircrafts. The contract is a part of the Supply Arrangement (SA) W8485-184741 Series.

**Eligibility:**
Only qualified suppliers holding the Supply Arrangement (SA) W8485-184741 Series are eligible to participate in this procurement. A list of invited suppliers includes:

* Aero Technical Components Inc.
* Pratt & Whitney Canada Corp.
* Unisource Technology Inc.
* StandardAero Atlantic Inc.
* Tronosjet Maintenance Inc.
* Canada West Avionics
* Honeywell Ltd
* Mattis Aerospace
* TSL Aerospace Technologies
* AllClear Aerospace and Defence Inc.

**Procurement Details:**

* The Request for Proposal (RFP) documents will be emailed directly to the eligible suppliers.
* Inquiries regarding this RFP should be addressed to:
June Cole
Aerospace Equipment Program Management (DGAEPM)
Department of National Defence (DND) / Government of Canada
455, Boulvard de la carrière, Gatineau (QC) J8Y 6V7
June.Cole@forces.gc.ca

**Ongoing Opportunity for Qualification:**
A Notice will be posted on the Government Electronic Tendering System (GETS) at least once a year to allow more suppliers to become qualified for the Supply Arrangement W8485-184741 Series.

**Trade Agreements:**
This procurement is subject to the Canadian Free Trade Agreement (CFTA).

**Regions of Opportunity:**
The procurement is open to suppliers in the National Capital Region (NCR).

**Contracting Officer:**
Jessica Lepinski, Supply Team Leader, can be reached by email at jessica.lepinski@tpsgc-pwgsc.gc.ca for further information.

**Notice URL:**
No URL is available for this notice.

**Deadline:**
Please note the tender closing date is 2023-05-23T14:00:00.

---

Note: I have removed some unnecessary information, and I rewrote the text to make it sound more professional and concise. I also added some headings and formatting to make the text easy to read. I have not included the bilingual text as it is
